headline: Host Hotels & Resorts Provides Updated Fourth Quarter 2025 Investor Presentation
summary: BETHESDA, Md., Feb. 19, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Host Hotels & Resorts, Inc. (NASDAQ: HST) (the “Company”), the nation’s largest lodging real estate investment trust, today provided an updated investor presentation for fourth quarter 2025 results. The investor presentation can be found on the Investor Relations section on the Company’s website at https://www.hosthotels.com/#key-investors-materials. headline: Host Hotels' Q4 AFFO & Revenues Top Estimates, Hotel RevPAR Rises
summary: HST tops Q4 AFFO and revenue estimates as RevPAR climbs on higher room rates and strong transient leisure demand.

headline: Assessing Host Hotels & Resorts (HST) Valuation After Earnings Beat And US$1.1b Premium Resort Sale
summary: Why Host Hotels & Resorts (HST) is Back in Focus After Earnings and Asset Sales Host Hotels & Resorts (HST) is back on investors’ radar after reporting full year 2025 results and beating forecasts on funds from operations and revenue, alongside a sizable premium resort portfolio sale. See our latest analysis for Host Hotels & Resorts. Those earnings and asset sale headlines have come alongside a clear pickup in momentum, with an 8.98% 1 month share price return and a 20.52% 3 month share...

headline: Host Hotels & Resorts shares are trading higher after the company reported better-than-expected Q4 financial results. Also, the company sold For Seasons hotels in Walt Disney World and Jackson Hole.
